Module: parseSamJsonToTranscripJson

Converts a transcription of json witb IBM STT API specs to a transcription json that meets autoEdit2 specs

Author:
  • Pietro Passarelli
Source:
  • interactive_transcription_generator/transcriber/ibm_stt_node/sam_transcriber_json_convert.js, line 1
Tutorials:
  • IBM_watson_stt_specs
  • autoEdit2_transcrition_json_spec
Example

Example usage parsing IBM STT transcription Json specs

  var fs = require("fs")
  var demo= "tramscription.json"
  var demoContent = JSON.parse(fs.readFileSync(demo).toString());

  parseSamJsonToTranscripJson(demoContent, function(res){
    console.log(JSON.stringify(res, nul, 4))
    fs.writeFileSync("./transcription.json",JSON.stringify(res, nul, 4) )
  })

Methods

(inner) parseSamJsonToTranscripJson()

Converts a transcription of json witb IBM STT API specs to a transcription json that meets autoEdit2 specs

Parameters:
Type Description
object

IBM STT transcription json spec
